Class LocalWorkerState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.server.master.utils.JDOSupport<org.apache.taverna.server.master.localworker.PersistedState>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PolicyLimits, WorkerModel

    public class LocalWorkerState
extends JDOSupport<org.apache.taverna.server.master.localworker.PersistedState>
implements WorkerModel
    The persistent state of a local worker factory.

    Donal Fellows
